message_1: What is the balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between sodium hydroxide and lead (II) nitrate?
message_2:
The balanced chemical equation for the double replacement reaction between sodium hydroxide (NaOH) and lead (II) nitrate [Pb(NO3)2] is:

2 NaOH (aq) + Pb(NO3)2 (aq) â†’ 2 NaNO3 (aq) + Pb(OH)2 (s)
